message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this product will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $11,500. How about we try $11,000?
